mapper.sql: id, name, number_code, category_model, current_status, operation_system, operation_system_name, description, gmt_create, gmt_modified, create_user, modified_user, status,executor
mapper.update:
update
current_status = #{currentStatus },
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified },
modified_user = #{modifiedUser },
where id = #{id} and status=1
mapper.select:
select
from

select * from
and status=1
order by
gmt_modified
gmt_create
desc
LIMIT #{pageSize} offset #{pageOffset}
mapper.update:
update
status = 0, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser},
where id in
#{item}
and current_status=2
mapper.select: SELECT ait.id as stringId, ait.`name`, ait.number_code AS numberCode, ait.description, ( SELECT count(*) FROM asset_software_install_template WHERE install_template_id = ait.id AND STATUS = 1 ) AS softNum, ( SELECT count(*) FROM asset_patch_install_template WHERE install_template_id = ait.id AND STATUS = 1 ) AS patchNum FROM asset_install_template AS ait WHERE ait.STATUS = 1 AND ait.id =#{templateId}
SELECT DISTINCT operation_system as osCode,operation_system_name as osName FROM asset_install_template where status=1
SELECT DISTINCT current_status FROM `asset_install_template` where status=1 order by current_status ;
SELECT count(*) FROM `asset_install_template` WHERE number_code=#{numberCode} and status=1
select count(1) from asset_software_install_template where install_template_id = #{pid} and status = 1

select t2.id, t2.business_id as businessId, t2.number, t2.type, t2.supplier, t2.product_name as productName, t2.version, t2.upgrade_msg as upgradeMsg, t2.sys_version as sysVersion, t2.language, t2.soft_version as softVersion, t2.soft_platform as softPlatform, t2.hard_platform as hardPlatform, t2.other from asset_software_install_template t1 inner join asset_hard_soft_lib t2 on t1.software_id = t2.business_id where t1.install_template_id = #{pid} and t1.status = 1
select count(1) from asset_patch_install_template where install_template_id = #{pid} and status = 1

select t2.id, patch_number as patchNumber, antiy_patch_number as antiyPatchNumber, patch_name as patchName, patch_level as patchLevel, path_source as pathSource, hotfix, user_interaction as userInteraction, exclusive_install as exclusiveInstall, network_status as networkStatus from asset_patch_install_template t1 inner join patch_info t2 on t1.patch_id = t2.id where t1.install_template_id = #{pid} and t1.status=1
select sw_type from baseline_template where id=#{baselineId}
mapper.insert:
insert into asset_install_template_check
install_template_id,
user_id,
advice,
result,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
create_user,
modified_user,
#{stringId},
#{userId},
#{advice},
#{result},
#{gmtCreate},
#{gmtModified},
#{createUser},
#{modifiedUser},
mapper.select: select patch_id from asset_patch_install_template where install_template_id = #{pid} and status=1

select t2.id as id, patch_number as patchNumber, antiy_patch_number as antiyPatchNumber, patch_name as patchName, patch_level as patchLevel, path_source as pathSource, hotfix, user_interaction as userInteraction, exclusive_install as exclusiveInstall, network_status as networkStatus from asset_patch_install_template t1 inner join patch_info t2 on t1.patch_id = t2.id where t1.install_template_id = #{installTemplateId} and t1.status=1 and t2.status = 1
select software_id from asset_software_install_template where install_template_id = #{installTemplateId} and status = 1
